$ec2Client = new Aws\Ec2\Ec2Client([
    'region' => 'us-west-2',
    'version' => '2016-11-15',
    'profile' => 'default'
]);

$result = $ec2Client->terminateInstances(array(
    'DryRun' => true || false,
    // InstanceIds is required
    'InstanceIds' => array('InstanceId1', 'InstanceId2'),
));

var_dump($result);
